data.trans_hint: Đây là lịch trình cho chuyến bay.
data.en_hint: Here is the timetable for our flight.
data.content_game_1: Here is the timetable for our flight.
data.answer_en_hint: Here is the timetable for our flight.

data.trans_hint: Tôi sẽ đợi ở bến xe buýt cho chuyến xe tiếp theo.
data.en_hint: I'll wait at the bus station for the next bus.
data.content_game_1: I'll wait at the bus station for the next bus.
data.answer_en_hint: I'll wait at the bus station for the next bus.

data.trans_hint: Điểm dừng xe buýt này lúc nào cũng đông.
data.en_hint: This bus stop is always crowded.
data.content_game_1: This bus stop is always crowded.
data.answer_en_hint: This bus stop is always crowded.

data.trans_hint: Bạn phải trả tiền vé xe buýt trước.
data.en_hint: You need to pay the bus fare in advance.
data.content_game_1: You need to pay the bus fare in advance.
data.answer_en_hint: You need to pay the bus fare in advance.

data.trans: Chặng đường, tuyến đường, con đường
data.trans_hint: Chặng đường đưa ta qua núi.
data.en_hint: Our route took us through the mountain.
data.content_game_1: Our route took us through the mountain.
data.answer_en_hint: Our route took us through the mountain.

data.trans_hint: Tài xế xe buýt thường lái xe nhanh.
data.en_hint: The bus driver usually drives fast.
data.content_game_1: The bus driver usually drives fast.
data.answer_en_hint: The bus driver usually drives fast.

data.trans_hint: Người soát vé nhìn chằm chằm vào tôi.
data.en_hint: The ticket collector stares at me.
data.content_game_1: The ticket collector stares at me.
data.answer_en_hint: The ticket collector stares at me.

data.trans: Người thanh tra, người kiểm tra
data.trans_hint: Một nhóm thanh tra đến chợ sáng nay.
data.en_hint: A group of inspectors went to the market this morning.
data.content_game_1: A group of inspectors went to the market this morning.
data.answer_en_hint: A group of inspectors went to the market this morning.

data.trans_hint: Đừng đi vào làn đường xe buýt, nguy hiểm đấy
data.en_hint: Don't walk in the bus lane, it's dangerous.
data.content_game_1: Don't walk in the bus lane, it's dangerous.
data.answer_en_hint: Don't walk in the bus lane, it's dangerous.

data.trans_hint: Tôi xuống xe buýt ở điểm dừng cuối.
data.en_hint: I get off at the bus terminus.
data.content_game_1: I get off at the bus terminus.
data.answer_en_hint: I get off at the bus terminus.
